turkish_example_sentence: Onlar bu acil onarımı yapmasalar eski bina çöküp düşecek.
english_example_sentence: If they were not to do this urgent repair, the old building would collapse and fall.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы они не провели этот срочный ремонт, старое здание рухнет и упадет.
